title: Iam looking for players for a ranked team
body:
Hi iam LUD LOL CHAMP and iam lvl 25 almost lvl 26 iam hoping to achieve lvl 30 by thuursday next week and will be starting a team iam looking for:
ADC
JUNGLE
TOP 
SUPPORT
MID 

If ur intrested add LUD LOL CHAMP In game or comment below

replies.body: I just played 2 games with you and Skarner jng you got 1/5 and Alkali Mid you got 2/18. Sorry m8 {{summoner:4}}  out guys
Am already ranked at b2 at the moment, can suss match history though as majoirty of losses i still go even or positive. Atm i seem to be playing adc, mid, or jg but i am a support main

thats great iam sure u can join the team please add LUD LOL CHAMP 
for more details
To be in a ranked team you must be level 30 and you don't have to have a rank.
thanks zahe but if u read my script then it clealrly states that iam nor lvl 30 but should be there before thursday and then i will start the team
Level 30 jung/adc hmu if you want to,
thx i can have u as a adc i just had a bit of a technilogy breakdown as my charger broke so iam a bit behind schedule pls add LUD LOL CHAMP
